snippet: Reborn after Hurricane Sandy’s destruction, the Boardwalk has been transformed into a gentler version of its gritty former self.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column on Coney Island Boardwalk, which has been transformed into a gentler version of its gritty former self following destruction from Hurricane Sandy; notes Mondays during the summer are outdoor movie nights, in which visitors can enjoy American favorites on a 40-foot-wide inflated screen free of charge.
lead_paragraph: Reborn after Hurricane Sandy’s destruction, the Boardwalk has been transformed into a gentler version of its gritty former self.

headline.main: As the Sun Sets Over Coney Island, Nostalgia Glows With Renewal
headline.print_headline: As the Sun Sets Over Coney Island, Nostalgia Glows With Renewal
